title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others‚Äô private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement andrewallenbruce@gmail.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla‚Äôs code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Coerce vector to <date> class ‚Äî as_date
text: x vector ... additional arguments fmt <chr> format; default "%Y-%m-%d"

title: Bureau Code ‚Äî bureau_code
text: Combined Agency Bureau Code, OMB Circular -11, Appendix C (PDF)

title: Bureau Code ‚Äî bureau_code
text: x <chr> bureau code search , e.g., "38"; NULL (default), returns bureau codes

title: Bureau Code ‚Äî bureau_code
code: bureau_code("38") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 6 #>   agencyName              bureauName agencyCode bureauCode treasuryCode cgacCode #>   <chr>                   <chr>      <chr>      <chr>      <chr>        <chr>    #> 1 Department of Health a‚Ä¶ Centers f‚Ä¶ 009        38         75           075       head(bureau_code()) #> # A tibble: 6 √ó 6 #>   agencyName         bureauName      agencyCode bureauCode treasuryCode cgacCode #>   <chr>              <chr>           <chr>      <chr>      <chr>        <chr>    #> 1 Legislative Branch Senate          001        05         00           000      #> 2 Legislative Branch House of Repre‚Ä¶ 001        10         00           000      #> 3 Legislative Branch Joint Items     001        11         00           000      #> 4 Legislative Branch Capitol Police  001        13         02           002      #> 5 Legislative Branch Office of Comp‚Ä¶ 001        12         09           009      #> 6 Legislative Branch Congressional ‚Ä¶ 001        14         08           008

title: API Class ‚Äî class_API
code: class_API(   type = "dcat:Dataset",   accessLevel = "public",   bureauCode = "009:38",   programCode = "009:000",   contactPoint = class_contactPoint(),   dataQuality = TRUE,   publisher = class_publisher(),   references = character(0),   title = character(0),   description = character(0),   accrualPeriodicity = character(0),   issued = NULL,   modified = NULL,   released = NULL,   temporal = character(0),   identifier = class_Identifier(),   accessURL = character(0),   resourcesAPI = class_Resources(),   downloadURL = character(0),   describedBy = character(0),   landingPage = character(0) )

title: API Class ‚Äî class_API
text: type <chr> type accessLevel <chr> Dataset access level bureauCode <chr> Dataset bureau code programCode <chr> Dataset program code contactPoint <S7_class> dataQuality <lgl> Dataset data quality publisher <S7_class> references <chr> Dataset references title <chr> Dataset title description <chr> Dataset description accrualPeriodicity <chr> Dataset update frequency issued <chr> Date Dataset issued modified <chr> Date Dataset last modified released <chr> Date Dataset released temporal <chr> Date range Current dataset covers identifier <S7_class> dcat:Dataset url nrows dataset accessURL <chr> dcat:Distribution url resourcesAPI <S7_class> data.frame available supplemental resources downloadURL <chr> dcat:Distribution url csv versions describedBy <chr> Hyperlink Data dictionary landingPage <chr> Hyperlink API landing page

title: Identifier Class ‚Äî class_Identifier

title: Medicare Provider Enrollees ‚Äî enrollees
text: Individual & Organizational Enrollment-level Data Providers Actively Approved Bill Medicare.

title: Medicare Provider Enrollees ‚Äî enrollees
code: enrollees(   npi = NULL,   pac = NULL,   enid = NULL,   spec_code = NULL,   spec_desc = NULL,   first = NULL,   middle = NULL,   last = NULL,   org = NULL,   state = NULL,   gender = NULL )

title: Medicare Provider Enrollees ‚Äî enrollees
text: npi <chr> 10-digit Individual NPI pac <chr> 10-digit PECOS Associate Control (PAC) ID enid <chr> 15-digit Medicare Enrollment ID spec_code <chr> Enrollment specialty code spec_desc <chr> Enrollment specialty description first, middle, last <chr> Individual provider's name org <chr> Organizational provider's name state <chr> Enrollment state abbreviation gender <chr> Individual provider's gender: "F" (Female) "M" (Male) "9" (Unknown/Organization)

title: Medicare Provider Enrollees ‚Äî enrollees
code: enrollees(enid = "I20040309000221") #> Medicare Fee-For-Service  Public Provider Enrollment  #>   ==> Periodicity: [R/P3M] Quarterly #>   ==> Last Modified: 2025-01-15 #>  #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 11 #>   NPI        PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID ENRLMT_ID    PROVIDER_TYPE_CD PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC #>   <chr>      <chr>              <chr>        <chr>            <chr>              #> 1 1417918293 3870481252         I2004030900‚Ä¶ 14-41            PRACTITIONER - OP‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 6 more variables: STATE_CD <chr>, FIRST_NAME <chr>, MDL_NAME <chr>, #> #   LAST_NAME <chr>, ORG_NAME <chr>, GNDR_SW <chr>  enrollees(npi = "1417918293", spec_code = "14-41") #> Medicare Fee-For-Service  Public Provider Enrollment  #>   ==> Periodicity: [R/P3M] Quarterly #>   ==> Last Modified: 2025-01-15 #>  #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 11 #>   NPI        PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID ENRLMT_ID    PROVIDER_TYPE_CD PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC #>   <chr>      <chr>              <chr>        <chr>            <chr>              #> 1 1417918293 3870481252         I2004030900‚Ä¶ 14-41            PRACTITIONER - OP‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 6 more variables: STATE_CD <chr>, FIRST_NAME <chr>, MDL_NAME <chr>, #> #   LAST_NAME <chr>, ORG_NAME <chr>, GNDR_SW <chr>  enrollees(pac = "2860305554", gender = "9") #> Medicare Fee-For-Service  Public Provider Enrollment  #>   ==> Periodicity: [R/P3M] Quarterly #>   ==> Last Modified: 2025-01-15 #>  #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 11 #>   NPI        PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID ENRLMT_ID    PROVIDER_TYPE_CD PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC #>   <chr>      <chr>              <chr>        <chr>            <chr>              #> 1 1134122260 2860305554         I2003111000‚Ä¶ 14-41            PRACTITIONER - OP‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 6 more variables: STATE_CD <chr>, FIRST_NAME <chr>, MDL_NAME <chr>, #> #   LAST_NAME <chr>, ORG_NAME <chr>, GNDR_SW <chr>

title: Format API Queries ‚Äî format_query
text: args named <list> vector <chr> arguments operator <chr> logical operator; acceptable options : =, >=, <=, >, <, <>, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, CONTAINS, , , , , NULL, NULL

title: Format API Queries ‚Äî format_query
code: format_query(list("NPI" = "1417918293", "PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID" = NULL)) #>     filter[fID1][path] filter[fID1][operator]    filter[fID1][value]  #>                  "NPI"                    "="           "1417918293"   format_query(c("NPI" = "1417918293", "PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID" = NULL)) #>     filter[fID1][path] filter[fID1][operator]    filter[fID1][value]  #>                  "NPI"                    "="           "1417918293"

title: Filter Public Catalog ‚Äî public_filter
text: endpoint <chr> API endpoint; options "dataset" (default), "latest", "api", "csv" title <chr> dataset title search ; use NULL return

title: Recode ISO 8601 Recurring Time Intervals ‚Äî recode_iso8601
code: accrualPeriodicity = c(   "R/PT1S",   "R/PT1H",  "R/P1D", "R/P3.5D",   "R/P0.33W", "R/P0.5W", "R/P1W", "R/P2W",   "R/P0.33M", "R/P0.5M", "R/P1M", "R/P2M",   "R/P3M",    "R/P4M",   "R/P6M", "R/P1Y",   "R/P2Y",    "R/P3Y",   "R/P4Y", "R/P10Y")  recode_iso8601(accrualPeriodicity) #>  [1] "[R/PT1S] Continuously"          "[R/PT1H] Hourly"                #>  [3] "[R/P1D] Daily"                  "[R/P3.5D] Twice a Week"         #>  [5] "[R/P0.33W] Three Times a Week"  "[R/P0.5W] Twice a Week"         #>  [7] "[R/P1W] Weekly"                 "[R/P2W] Biweekly"               #>  [9] "[R/P0.33M] Three Times a Month" "[R/P0.5M] Biweekly"             #> [11] "[R/P1M] Monthly"                "[R/P2M] Bimonthly"              #> [13] "[R/P3M] Quarterly"              "[R/P4M] Triannually"            #> [15] "[R/P6M] Biannually"             "[R/P1Y] Annually"               #> [17] "[R/P2Y] Biennially"             "[R/P3Y] Triennially"            #> [19] "[R/P4Y] Quadrennially"          "[R/P10Y] Decennially"
